sentences.sContent: One solution to this agency problem is to have no alienable residual claims and to contract with donors to apply all net cash flows to output.
sentences.sContent_eng: One solution to this agency problem is to have no alienable residual claims and to contract with donors to apply all net cash flows to output.
sentences.sCn: 解决这种代理问题的方案是让剩余索取权不具有可转让性，并且和捐赠者签定契约，把现金流用在适当的地方。

words.tran: 外国的；相异的，性质不同的；不相容的
异化；疏远；转让；[内科] 精神错乱；间离效果（alienation effect）
